name: Ghirardelli Square Hotel
proximityToAttractions: Located in the heart of Ghirardelli Square, within walking distance to Fisherman’s Wharf and the Golden Gate Bridge.
accessibility: Accessible for guests with disabilities, including ramps and elevators.
wifi: Complimentary high-speed WiFi in all areas.
breakfast: Full breakfast buffet with a variety of options.
poolAndSpa: Outdoor heated pool and spa for relaxation and enjoyment.
climateControl: Individually controlled heating and air conditioning in every room.
recentReview: Excellent hotel with a great view of the bay.
serviceAndStaff: Friendly and attentive staff who go above and beyond to exceed guest expectations.
cancellation: Flexible cancellation policy up to 24 hours prior to arrival.
restaurant: On-site restaurant offering fine dining with a focus on local cuisine.
roomService: 24-hour room service available with a wide selection of dishes.
familyFriendly: Family-friendly amenities including cribs, high chairs, and childproofing upon request.
petPolicy: Pet-friendly hotel with designated pet-friendly rooms.
shuttleService: Complimentary shuttle service to major attractions within the city.
parking: Valet parking available for an additional fee.
safetyAndSecurity: State-of-the-art security system ensuring guest safety.
specialOffers: Special offers available for extended stays and weekend getaways.
ambianceAndDecor: Modern and elegant decor creating a sophisticated ambiance.
environmentalInitiatives: Hotel participates in various environmental initiatives to reduce carbon footprint.
businessAmenities: Fully equipped business center and meeting rooms for corporate events.
viewAndSurroundings: Rooms with stunning views of the city skyline and the bay.
noiseLevel: Soundproof rooms for a peaceful and quiet stay.
